title: Game does not launch properly in second window after finishing champ select
body:
This happened to me just now in a Dark Star game, and more importantly last night in a threes ranked. Everything was fine, the second window flashed on the bottom bar like it was about to take over the full screen, and then nothing happened. I tried closing that window and reconnecting about 5 times, then closing and rebooting the client about 5 times, then even restarting my computer 2 times, nothing got that secondary window that loads the game to do anything other than be an icon on the bottom bar. 

Any ideas on this? Super obnoxious and there seems to be no documentation on solves for this that I can find as of yet. This will be the second leaver game I'll have in two days and I'm not happy about it. Nothing is wrong with internet, etc.

replies.body: That does sound obnoxious, and the culprit in this case may be a connection problem.  More specifically, it sounds like your network is failing to reach the game server after champion select.  Your best bet is to run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Went through the list and tried everything I could, and still to no avail. The launcher just won't do anything but pop up as an icon on my status bar and do nothing else. If I try to alt tab to it, there's nothing shown as part of that window. Tried all sensible solutions, the only one I can think of as not having been done correctly is potentially the firewall issue. Avast has some game mode that it uses now, but apart from that I couldn't control my windows firewall separate from the app and thus am not sure if I did it correctly.

When champion selection ends, your network needs to transition to the game server.  If that connection fails, your client will either remain dormant, load as a black screen, or time out completely.  If the connection guide hasn't helped, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech guys can dig into this with you.

Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well for some more logs, and attach it to your ticket.  The HRT also has an option to help auto-configure your firewall settings.  We'll respond back as soon as we can!
